description:
In _Flash Professional CS5: Character Animation_, Dermot O' Connor explains
the process of character animation in Flash, using nested symbols and motion
and shape tweening to create believable characters. The course covers the
process from start to finish, from rigging a character to creating a walk
cycle animation. Along the way, Dermot demonstrates techniques such as
animating eye blinks, head turns, and mouth movements during dialogue.
Exercise files accompany the course.
title: Flash Professional CS5: Character Animation
